description:
Is an unwanted hug an assault?

Officers are sounding the alarm on hugging bandits who are approaching strangers and pretending they want to hug them while the only intention is to rob them.

Mugged while hugged? Yes, that's a thing www.youtube.com

While one should remain vigilant whenever a stranger approaches you, officers warn to be extra cautious when a hug is involved.

According to
title: Watch: Authorities are sounding the alarm about hugging strangers because there's a gang of hugging muggers on the loose

description:
Trump's granddaughter, Kai Trump, gave a moving speech at the RNC convention Wednesday night, however, Whoopi Goldberg, being the out-of-touch and unhinged leftist that she is, did not “fall for that!”

Whoopi Goldberg attacks Donald Trump's grandkids: "I know his grandchild was up on the thing and they're trying to humanize him and change your idea about who this guy is. Don't fall for that!" pic.twitter.com/wWwIiZTZ0q
— Nicholas Fondacaro (@NickFondacaro) July 18, 2024

In other words, she is mad that Kai's speech interferes with her attempt to dehumanize Trump.

Kai said Trump was “just a norm
title: Watch: Whoopi Attacks Trump's Granddaughter, Warns The Tens of "The View's" Fans Not To Fall For It

description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

It’s not uncommon for liberals to go bat sh*t crazy when they don’t get their way, as unhinged, temper tantrums are the norm among leftists. It’s also not out of the ordinary for elected officials to do bizarre things when defeated but in New York City, never underestimate a council member's ability to go feral on a moment's notice.

Councilwoman Susan Zhuang bit a NYPD officer during a protest in Brooklyn and even NYPD Chief of Patrol John Chell is flabbergasted by the situation.
title: Democrat councilwoman goes bananas, BITES police officer at protest

title: MSNBC's Joy Reid: Biden surviving COVID is totally the same as Trump surviving being shot
